Html: Anyone know where I can find them?
I diffed the sources to see the changes since I couldn't find any release notes for the final release.

Hi,

The Drop 10 of Prism is code complete. It means that in the RTW you will find documentation updates and bug fixes. That said, I think that you can find the following documentation section interesting:

  • Prism 4.0 Readme
  • What's New in Prism 4.0

Additionally, you could take a look at the following post in the Karl Shifflett's Blog: Prism 4.0 For Visual Studio 2010, .NET Framework 4.0, WPF & Silverlight 4

Hope this helps

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
